body:
Comment 8: 
If you cd src/pkg/archive/tar you can run gotest to run the tests manually. I assume 
that it'll crash then at least.

In which case, you should see the 6.out file in the directory. Running that should 
crash just the same. If that's the case, can you attach the 6.out and also:

% gdb ./6.out
... gdb startup ...
r<enter>
... it crashes ....
info reg<enter>
... stuff ....
bt<enter>
... more stuff ...


and paste or attach the whole gdb interaction?
